lyrics:
9 contributorssongs about rain lyricsverse 1
well this town has closed down way too early and theres nothing to do
so im driving around in circles and im thinking about you
today i heard you got a new last name
sure didnt know it was gonna hit me this way
and the radio just keeps on playin all these songs about rain

refrain
rainy night in georgia kentucky rain

verse 2
now theres all kinds of songs about babies and love that goes right
but for some unknown reason nobody wants to play them tonight
hey i hope its sunny wherever you are
but thats sure not the picture tonight in my car
and it sure aint easing my pain all these songs like

chorus
rainy night in georgia and kentucky rain
here comes that rainy day feeling again
blue eyes crying in the early morning rain
they go on and on and theres no two the same
oh it would be easy to blame all these songs about rain

verse 3
well i thought i was over you but i guess maybe im not
cause when i let you go looks like lonely is all that i got
guess ill never know what could have been
sure aint helping this mood that im in
if theyre gonna keep on playin these songs like
see gary allan liveget tickets as low as 51you might also likechorus
rainy night in georgia and kentucky rain
here comes that rainy day feeling again
blue eyes crying in the early morning rain
they go on and on and theres no two the same
oh how i wish i could blame all these songs about rain

outro
rainy night in georgia kentucky rain
here comes that rainy day feeling again all these songs about rain
blue eyes crying in the early morning rain
they go on and on theres no two the same
rainy night in georgia kentucky rain
here comes that rainy day feeling again songs about rain
blue eyes crying in the early morning rain
they go on and onembed
